version_description: * New Release Optimized for iPad
Performance Optimizations

Las Vegas Property Wayfinding
Optimized Hotel Booking
Persistent Notification and Favorite Preferences
One-Click access to offers, hotel and restaurants from the home page
Fixed an App Crash Issue
Inclusion of Hotel Self Check-In and Self Check-Out for participating locations
Bug fixes for properties and hotel services
Mobile offer optimizations and request transportation option.
Optimizations and bug fixes
Inclusion of Restaurant Reservations by account profile information and push notifications based on offer qualification.
Updates and Bug Fixes
Complete App Redesign - Persistent Navigation Bar, Personalized Account View, Offer Calendar View and Optimized Explore Section.
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements
Maintenance release.
New enhancements including One-Touch Log In TouchID, Virtual Total Rewards Card and Book Now on Home Page.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
Total Rewards has become Caesars Rewards - a new name, same great loyalty program.  Stay tuned as we transform the mobile app to Caesars Rewards.
Maintenance release.
Back-end enhancements to improve ease of use.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.

We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
Upgrade now for performance improvements including the ability to search, navigate and discover points of interest at the Cromwell.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.

Check out our new look and sleeker design by upgrading now. You’ll find all the same great functionality such as checking and redeeming your offers, booking hotels and shows, and navigating on property.
This upgrade will allow you to view the best available hotel rates in the app, as well as other small tweaks that will ensure a seamless mobile experience.
Upgrade now to more easily redeem offers and view other performance enhancements.
Total Rewards has become Caesars Rewards - a new name, same great loyalty program.  Stay tuned as we transform the mobile app to Caesars Rewards.
Total Rewards became Caesars Rewards on February 1, 2019.  Upgrade now to experience the new look of the Caesars Rewards app while enjoying the same great functionality.
Upgrade now to experience the new look of the Caesars Rewards app while enjoying the same great functionality.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
Upgrade now to experience the new look of the Caesars Rewards app while enjoying the same great functionality.
We’ve made many back-end enhancements for this major app release. Upgrade now to 6.1 for a faster, more reliable mobile experience.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.

We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
We updated the app to support iOS 13.  Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.
We’ve added new features on the ‘Caesars Rewards’ screen and the ability to easily access your ‘Messages’ and ‘My Bank’ right from the home screen. Upgrade now for these and other enhancements.
We’ve fixed an issue with adding offers to your calendar that caused the app to crash for some users. Update now to check the Offers screen for your latest offers today!
We’ve made the app better, faster and more reliable. Upgrade now for a more seamless mobile experience.

We’ve made it easier to filter and view all your offers at a glance, and we added Diamond Plus and Diamond Elite as new tier levels. Upgrade now for these enhancements, and a free-to-play Blackjack game.

We’ve made it easier to filter and view all your offers at a glance, and we added Diamond Plus and Diamond Elite as new tier levels. Upgrade now for these enhancements, and a free-to-play Blackjack game.
We’ve added new screens to help you understand how to earn and redeem your Reward Credits, and easily track your Reward Credits history. Upgrade now for these and other design enhancements!
We’ve added new screens to help you understand how to earn and redeem your Reward Credits, and easily track your Reward Credits history. Upgrade now for these and other design enhancements!

We’ve added the ability to easily book Las Vegas attractions such as the High Roller, Fly LINQ, Eiffel Tower Viewing Deck, Qua Spa at Caesars Palace, and select pool cabanas from the app!  Upgrade now for these and other design enhancements that make for a more seamless mobile experience.
We’ve made some back-end improvements that will ensure a more seamless mobile experience. Update now to easily book hotels, restaurants, shows, and now attractions in one easy-to-use app!
We’ve made some improvements that will ensure a more seamless mobile experience. Update now to easily book hotels, restaurants, shows and attractions in one easy-to-use app!
We’ve made some performance improvements for a better mobile experience. Update now to easily book hotels, restaurants, shows and attractions in one easy-to-use app!

We’ve added the ability to modify and cancel hotel and restaurant reservations in the app! You can also easily upgrade your hotel room with a few clicks. Update now for these and other convenient enhancements.
We fixed an issue with requesting hotel room upgrades. Update now to easily upgrade your hotel room with a few clicks!

We’ve made improvements to support iOS 14 and how errors are handled throughout the app to ensure a more seamless experience. Update now to easily book hotels, restaurants, shows and attractions in one easy-to-use app!
We added the ability to accept credit cards for select restaurants when making OpenTable reservations in the app. Update now to easily book hotels, restaurants, shows and attractions!

Our new Find My Room feature helps guests navigate to their rooms at Caesars Palace Las Vegas and soon, other Vegas properties. For our non-app users, we made the Find My Room feature plus the ability to book restaurant reservations available via Apple’s new App Clips feature.  Update now to experience these innovations during your next trip to Vegas!

We’ve made some performance improvements for a better mobile experience. Update now to also experience our newest innovations during your next trip including a Find My Room feature that helps our guests navigate to their rooms at all our Las Vegas properties!
